Description: DO NOT operate door with aircraft power ON unless specifically instructed
Ensure door is properly supported before removing hinge pins
Consequences: Door falling; Personnel injury; Equipment damage

Description: DO NOT open door when cabin is pressurized
Consequences: Rapid decompression; Personnel injury; Aircraft damage

Description: Keep hands clear of latch mechanism during operation
Wear appropriate PPE when working with sealants and adhesives
Consequences: Skin irritation; Respiratory issues; Chemical burns

Description: DO NOT block or obstruct emergency exit doors
Consequences: Evacuation delay; Loss of life in emergency

Description: Use fall protection when working at door opening
Consequences: Fall from aircraft; Personnel injury or death

Description: Keep fire extinguisher accessible during electrical work
Consequences: Electrical fire; Equipment damage; Personnel injury

Description: Use only approved tools and torque values
Consequences: Equipment damage; Improper installation; Safety compromise

Description: Verify CAOS system is in maintenance mode before testing
Consequences: False alerts; System confusion; Operational disruption
